channel.title: Cranes Handling / Lifting on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Cranes Handling / Lifting on Universal

item.title: E02154
item.description: Caterpillar TH360B tractor equipped with welding package, generator, welding machines, oxygen platform, rear view camera and other options available on request. 4 cyl. Caterpillar 3054E engine,100hp, E-rops cab,4x4x4 conf., 4 speed power-shuttle transmission 32km/h max speed, 16.9-24 tyres, joy stick & remote controlled hydr. Hiab 071AW 7.2 tm crane, 7.2 mtr max reach, hydr.powered 10bar 1080l/min aircompressor 240ltr air receiver. Other crane and compressor options available on request, 2 hydr. operated front stabilizers.

item.title: E04070
item.description: Caterpillar TH62, enclosed cab with FOPS, Rebuild Caterpillar 3054 engine with 100HP (75kW), 4 speed powershift transmission, 4x4x4 configuration, 4WD, dual axis joystick control, brand new seat, rated load capacity 3.000 Kgs, max. lift height 7.6 Mtr, 7.700 Kgs operating weight, quick coupler, extra hydr. spoolvalve, brand new 17.5LR24 tyres. Machine has new paint, is workshop tested, fully repaired and is in very good and clean condition. Machine is including pallet fork & GP bucket.

item.title: E04799
item.description: New & unused Xrok Transporter 6036T Mobile tracked stockpiling conveyor belt, powered by Caterpillar C2.2 engine with 49HP (36kW), 18 Mtr length, belt width 900mm, EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, remote greasing, hydraulic cylinders for raise and lower, CE marked. Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Machines are available for sale or rent.

item.title: E04874
item.description: Brand new and unused Xrok Transporter 4030E Electric mobile stockpiling conveyor belts. 40ft (12mtr) x 30” (750mm). EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, feed boot extension, remote greasing, electric motor (5.5 kW) and gearbox combination unit, radial wheels, CE marked. Up to 200 TPH capacity! Always in stock! Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Choice between 12mtr (40ft) until 24mtr (80ft), 750mm until 1000mm belts.

item.title: E04966
item.description: Xrok Transporter 5036T Mobile tracked stockpiling conveyor belt, powered by Caterpillar C2.2 engine with 49HP (36kW), 15 Mtr length, belt width 900mm, EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, remote greasing, hydraulic cylinders for raise and lower, undercarriage 75% remaining, 400mm pads, CE marked. Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Inspections are welcome. New Xrok stockpiling conveyor belts available from stock!

item.title: K01718
item.description: Unused factory built 14m x 900mm mobile feed conveyor complete with intergrated feed hopper. c/w single axle trailer. Suitable for feeding cone crusher or screen plant. Belt discharge height in working position 6.75 Mtr, Hopper length 4.0 Mtr, Hopper width 1.9 Mtr.
